# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I propose a special introductory price of $140 for you. This is an exclusive offer tailored just for you, taking into account your interest and the product's worth to you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the exceptional benefits it offers at a fantastic deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
